encyclopedia.content: 歌曲简介 坎耶·欧马立·韦斯特（Kanye Omari West，1977年6月8日出生）是一位美国的饶舌歌手、唱片制作人、作家和歌手。在2008年5月16日，坎耶·韦斯特获得MTV电视台选为该年度“最热门饶舌歌手”。《Heartless》是他的专辑《808s & Heartbreak》中的单曲。 歌词 In the night, I hear them talk 在那天晚上，我听到他们谈论 The coldest story ever told 是我听说的最冷酷的事 Somewhere far along this road, he lost his

entry.def: If you describe someone as heartless, you mean that they are cruel and unkind, and have no sympathy for anyone or anything.

example.ex: I couldn't believe they were so heartless...
example.tran: 我无法相信他们竟如此狠心。

example.ex: It was a heartless thing to do.

means.word_mean: 1. marked by lack of heart or feeling;
2. lacking in feeling or pity or warmth
